subject: Nutrition
title: Periodized Nutrition
description: A fast breakdown of Periodized Nutrition for builders.

hook.text: Elite athletes don't eat the same daily. They match nutrition to training phases throughout the year.

buildup.text: Heavy training days need more carbs and calories. Rest days need less energy but still require protein.

discovery.text: Periodized nutrition improves body composition and performance more than eating the same amount every day.

twist.text: Most recreational athletes eat too much on rest days and too little on hard daysâ€”the exact wrong pattern.

climax.text: Matching fuel to demand is the hallmark of elite nutrition. It turns good training into great results.

punchline.text: Eat for the work ahead, not the same amount every day.
